Class Circuit

java.lang.Object
  Circuit
All Implemented Interfaces:
CircuitInterface
public class Circuit
extends java.lang.Object
implements CircuitInterface

The circuit class is an object that stores a register and points to a linked list of gates.

Author:
Ewan Hemmingway
Ian Sullivan
James Vokes

          Holds the position of the current gate in the list.

Constructor Detail

Circuit

public Circuit(Register reg,
               boolean display)
Creates a circuit object which stores a given register passed into it.

Parameters:
reg - the circuit takes in a register as an argument and stores it in the object.
Method Detail

addGate

public void addGate(Gate gate)
Adds a gate to the end of the linked list of gates within the circuit. This method causes the gate to generate itself a matrix of the correct size to be applied to the stored register. The circuit will only let gates with valid parameters be added to it

Specified by:
addGate in interface CircuitInterface

apply

public void apply()
Applies the next gate in the linked list to the register.

Specified by:
apply in interface CircuitInterface

applyAll

public void applyAll()
Applies all the gates in the circuit sequentially to the register.

reset

public void reset()
Sets the register to the ground state, and sets the current gate to the first gate.

Specified by:
reset in interface CircuitInterface

getGate

public Gate getGate(int n)
Parameters:
n - position of the gate in the list.
Returns:
returns a gate at a given position in the circuit.

runOverallMatrix

public void runOverallMatrix()
Applies the matrix that represents the whole circuit to the register

Specified by:
runOverallMatrix in interface CircuitInterface

setOverallMatrix

public void setOverallMatrix()
Calculates the matrix that represents the whole circuit by multiplying all of the gates together in reverse order. This method will only work if all gates are represented by matrices (i.e. no functional gates), otherwise it will catch a ClassCastException and report to the user that the matrix could not be created.

Updates the graphical probability panel
